bug.author: facan1
bug.summary: https://www.tensorflow.org/robots.txt is disallowing all Search Engines crawling www.tensorflow.org.
bug.description: [https://www.tensorflow.org/robots.txt] User-agent: * Disallow: / Can you please allow Search Engines ? Thanks, Fabrice Canel Microsoft Bing

comments.comment: I think this is still not resolved. I still do not see r0.12 results in bing. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dr4b>@dr4b</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wolffg>@wolffg</denchmark-link>
Yeah, I think this one needs to go to Wolff -- sorry for not redirecting earlier.

This was fixed some time ago. [https://www.tensorflow.org/robots.txt] User-agent: * Disallow: /s/results* Sitemap: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/sitemap.xml>https://www.tensorflow.org/sitemap.xml</denchmark-link>
If we need to change it again, please re-open or re-file.
